clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 5.44 bpm.
Gallbladder shows homogeneous, no stones or wall thickening.
Uterus appears hyperechoic; endometrial thickness measures 21.04 mm.
Right kidney demonstrates homogeneous, no hydronephrosis.
Left kidney shows normal, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Placenta is homogeneous and normally located.
